(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT A) (JJ few) (NNS readers))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN expressed)
        (NP (NN interest))
        (PP (IN at)
          (S
            (VP (VBG getting)
              (NP (DT the) (NNP PowerShot) (NNP A590IS)))))))
    (. .)))


det(readers-3, A-1)
amod(readers-3, few-2)
nsubj(expressed-5, readers-3)
aux(expressed-5, have-4)
root(ROOT-0, expressed-5)
dobj(expressed-5, interest-6)
prep(expressed-5, at-7)
pcomp(at-7, getting-8)
det(A590IS-11, the-9)
nn(A590IS-11, PowerShot-10)
dobj(getting-8, A590IS-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ good) (NN news))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (VP (VBG having)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (NN promo))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN PC) (NN show)))
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB where))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP they))
                    (VP (MD will)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (PP (VBG including)
                          (NP (DT a) (JJ free) (CD 4GB) (NNP SD) (NN card)))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


det(news-3, The-1)
amod(news-3, good-2)
nsubj(is-4, news-3)
root(ROOT-0, is-4)
mark(having-8, that-5)
nsubj(having-8, they-6)
aux(having-8, are-7)
ccomp(is-4, having-8)
det(promo-11, a-9)
amod(promo-11, special-10)
dobj(having-8, promo-11)
prep(promo-11, at-12)
det(show-15, the-13)
nn(show-15, PC-14)
pobj(at-12, show-15)
advmod(be-19, where-16)
nsubj(be-19, they-17)
aux(be-19, will-18)
rcmod(promo-11, be-19)
prep(be-19, including-20)
det(card-25, a-21)
amod(card-25, free-22)
num(card-25, 4GB-23)
nn(card-25, SD-24)
pobj(including-20, card-25)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (CD 2GB))
    (VP (VBP SD)
      (NP (NN card)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(SD-2, 2GB-1)
root(ROOT-0, SD-2)
dobj(SD-2, card-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (CD 4) (NNS x))
    (VP (VBP rechargable)
      (NP (NNS batteries)))
    (, ,)))


num(x-2, 4-1)
nsubj(rechargable-3, x-2)
root(ROOT-0, rechargable-3)
dobj(rechargable-3, batteries-4)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NN camera))
    (NP
      (NP (NN case))
      (CC and)
      (NP (NNP SD) (NN card) (NN reader)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, camera-1)
dep(camera-1, case-2)
cc(case-2, and-3)
nn(reader-6, SD-4)
nn(reader-6, card-5)
conj(case-2, reader-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ Full) (NNS details))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NNP PC) (NNP Show) (NN promo))))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBN found)
          (PP (IN at)
            (PP (IN by)
              (S
                (VP (VBG clicking)
                  (NP (DT this) (NN link)))))))))))


amod(details-2, Full-1)
nsubjpass(found-10, details-2)
prep(details-2, of-3)
det(promo-7, the-4)
nn(promo-7, PC-5)
nn(promo-7, Show-6)
pobj(of-3, promo-7)
aux(found-10, can-8)
auxpass(found-10, be-9)
root(ROOT-0, found-10)
prep(found-10, at-11)
pcomp(at-11, by-12)
pcomp(by-12, clicking-13)
det(link-15, this-14)
dobj(clicking-13, link-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN PC) (NN show))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (NNP Suntec))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ runs)
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP (NNP 12-15) (NNP June)))))
    (. .)))


det(show-3, The-1)
nn(show-3, PC-2)
nsubj(is-4, show-3)
root(ROOT-0, is-4)
prep(is-4, at-5)
pobj(at-5, Suntec-6)
cc(is-4, and-7)
conj(is-4, runs-8)
prep(runs-8, from-9)
nn(June-11, 12-15-10)
pobj(from-9, June-11)
